trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的基元，处理所需的位置和大小调整的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件和两个<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>用于设置一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>的控件

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪控件不具有默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>作为的一部分实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪已<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件和两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>用于更改控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>跟踪控件的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示跟踪上滑块。

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **在滑块的轨道**![RepeatButton、 Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 Thumb")下表显示跟踪属性和相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>它们自动绑定到的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: 当这两个属性更改时，绑定的属性也会更改。

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: |跟踪属性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>属性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 下表显示跟踪属性和相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>属性到其绑定的一部分跟踪时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件和跟踪属性未显式设置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: |跟踪属性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>属性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 下表显示跟踪属性和相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>属性到其绑定的一部分跟踪时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件和跟踪属性未显式设置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: |跟踪属性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>属性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>与控件绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>跟踪控件的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 当跟踪用于向下滚动内容的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控件成正比的可视区域或视区中所示的内容的百分比。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>实现跟踪控件的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **滚动条具有跟踪控制**![ScrollBar 图](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar 图")以下计算用于计算的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>大小

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = viewportSize 参数是的值 (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 最大和最小参数都对应于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 最大表达式的值-最小 + viewportSize 是可滚动的内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>属性表示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的跟踪内容滚动到底部的时间。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>值是不相同形式的长度或范围的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的更详细的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>增加从上到下或从左到右，具体取决于的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>方向</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>的轨道</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>从底部到顶部或从左到右的方向<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>根据递增，</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>处于的轨道</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改增加值的方向，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>轨道属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的布局<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为提供的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>用于<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>用于减少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控件处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>将绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>可减少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>控制<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>具有默认设置的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取的子级<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子元素编制索引的属性进行设置的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: 子级的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>可视子元素的列表中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 索引必须是介于零 (0) 和的值之间的数字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>负一 (1) 的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引大于的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>负一 (1) 的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>类</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控件处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>将绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>控制<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>具有默认设置的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否增加的方向<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>从默认方向将被反转。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: 当 IsDirectionReversed 的值设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>交换位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>从左到右的这两个水平的值增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>对于垂直值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>而增加从上到下，对于垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>从底部到顶部的这些值增加。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: 当将 IsDirectionReversed 属性设置为`true`，增加值的方向将反转。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>作为的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制和你未显式设置 IsDirectionReversed 属性、 IsDirectionReversed 属性将绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *1> 和<> *1> 交换的位置和增加值的方向是反向; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大可能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控件处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控制和最大属性未显式设置，此属性自动绑定具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 最大值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件是相当于减去可见的内容区域或视区的大小的可滚动内容的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果内容的大小为 100，然后的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>属性为 30，最大属性的值为 70。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 这是 true 因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件对应于在可滚动内容中，将显示在视区顶部的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 当内容滚动到底部在此示例中时，30%的内容仍将显示在视区中。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>相对应的视区顶部为 70，和最大值为 70。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>对应的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要显式定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，创建派生的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>类并提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>替代</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>的对象</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>的大小

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>作为的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制和你未显式设置 ViewportSize 属性、 ViewportSize 属性将绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>中实现的控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控件始终是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>，这是因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控件不会更改大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 可滚动的内容的可见区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>，这意味着未定义的内容大小。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取子元素的数目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子元素编制索引的属性进行设置的顺序。

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 0 到指定的数中的子元素的 2 之间的整数<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。
